src:
Rossiyaning Primorye o‘lkasida yo‘lbars hujumiga uchragan ovchi shifoxonaga yotqizildi

04 Nov 2019, 18:33

Rossiyaning Primorye o‘lkasida yo‘lbars hujumiga uchragan ovchi turli tan jarohatlari bilan shifoxonaga yotqizilgan. Bu haqda “RIA Novosti” xabar berdi.
Hududdagi huquqni muhofaza qilish xodimlaridan biri yo‘lbarsning Krounovka qishlog‘i yaqinida erkakka hujum qilgani va ovchining o‘z miltig‘idan havoga bir nechta o‘q uzib yirtqich changalidan qutulib qolganini ma’lum qildi. Ovchi shifoxonaga yotqizilgan.
Mavzuga doir: Zimbabveda qizaloq dugonasini timsoh changalidan qutqarib qoldi
Politsiya vakilining so‘zlariga ko‘ra, jabrlanuvchining qurol olib yurish va ov qilishga ruxsatnomasi bor. Bu borada tergov-surishtiruv ishlari davom ettirilmoqda.

Mavzuga doir: 
Tojikistonda 12 ta qo‘yni g‘ajib tashlagan qor qoploni ushlandi (video)

Avval Rossiyadagi sayyor-sirk tomoshasi vaqtida ayiqning hayvon o‘rgatuvchiga hujum qilgani, shuningdek, AQShda yarador bug‘uning o‘zini o‘lganga solib yakunda ovchini halok etgani xabar qilingandi.
text:
A tiger hunter has been hospitalized in Russia's Primorye region

04 Nov 2019, 18:33 PM

A tiger hunter in Primorye, Russia, was hospitalized with various injuries. About it reports RIA Novosti.
A law enforcement official in the area said the tiger attacked a man near the village of Krounovka and escaped a wildfire with several bullets in the air. The hunter was hospitalized.
Topic: A Zimbabwean girl rescued her friend from the crocodile cliff
According to a police spokesman, the victim has a permit to carry weapons and hunt. An investigation is underway.

Topic:
Tajikistan hijacked 12 snow leopards (video)

Earlier it was reported that a bear attacked an animal trainer during a Russian circus show, and also killed a hunter who died in the USA, eventually killing himself.
